name: mute-button
title: Mute Button
oneLiner: A basic button for mute content

apiDoc.name: MuteButton
apiDoc.description: A button for muting/unmuting users or hashtags. Automatically hides when viewing own profile. Supports displaying target name/hashtag and icon. Uses createMuteAction builder for state management and publishes NIP-51 mute list updates.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance (uses context if not provided)

props.name: target
props.description: User or hashtag string to mute/unmute
